translations.footerAboutUsText: We're more than just a sock store - we're a celebration of your love for programming and technology. Founded by tech enthusiasts, our store is dedicated to bringing you a unique collection of socks that allow you to express your passion for coding and all things IT.
translations.footerNeedHelpText: Our customer support team is available via phone or email. Don't hesitate to reach out whenever you need assistance. We're committed to providing you with the best sock-shopping experience possible.
